name: Deborah Nadoolman Landis

roles_in_work.title: Hollywood Costume: Deborah Nadoolman Landis interview
Hollywood Costume: What is Costume Design? with Prof. D. Nadoolman Landis

biography: Deborah Nadoolman Landis is an American film and theatre costume designer. She worked on such notable films as Animal House, The Blues Brothers, Three Amigos, and Raiders of the Lost Ark.
